keyMappings:
map e scrollPageUp
map d scrollPageDown
map r nextTab
map R reload hard
map w previousTab
map gn goNext
map gN goPrevious
map s goForward
map a goBack
map <c-m> toggleMuteTab all
map <M> toggleMuteTab other
# map <c-n> passNextKey
map ' Marks.activateGotoMode
map gf LinkHints.activateModeWithQueue
map gh LinkHints.activateModeToOpenInNewForegroundTab count=999999
map <c-,> moveTabLeft count=99 
map <c-.> moveTabRight count=99
unmap <a-p>
map gp togglePinTab
map gd visitPreviousTab
map <a-'> closeTabsOnLeft
map <a-;> closeTabsOnRight
map , passNextKey normal
unmap <c-m>
unmap <c-q>
mapkey <c-q> Escape key
mapkey <c-[> Escape key
map , passNextKey normal count=999999
map yc LinkHints.activateMode action=hover map c LinkHints.activateMode action=focus map c LinkHints.activateMode action=copy-text
searchEngines:
w: https://www.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Special:Search&search=%s Wikipedia
# Google
# Example:
# g: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s Google
# Regular expression:
# ^https?://[a-z]+\.google\.(com|ie|co\.(uk|jp)|ca|com\.au)/
# More examples.
#
# (Vimium supports search completion Wikipedia, as
# above, and for these.)

gs: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s Google
rd: https://www.reddit.com/search?q=%s Reddit
# l: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s&btnI I'm feeling lucky...
yts: https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=%s Youtube
gm: https://www.google.com/maps?q=%s Google maps
im: https://www.imdb.com/find?ref_=nv_sr_fn&q=%s IMDB
fa: https://api.flutter.dev/?q=%s FlutterApi
# b: https://www.bing.com/search?q=%s Bing
# d: https://duckduckgo.com/?q=%s DuckDuckGo
ams: https://www.amazon.com/s/?field-keywords=%s Amazon
# qw: https://www.qwant.com/?q=%s Qwant
tae: http://translate.google.com/#auto|en|%s Translate Any _______ ---> English
tek: https://translate.google.com/#en%7Cko%7C%s%0A English ---> 한글
tke: https://translate.google.com/#ko%7Cen%7C%s%0A 한글 ---> English
translate: https://translate.google.com/?source=osdd#auto|auto|%s Translate Auto _______ ---> _______
so: https://stackoverflow.com/search?q=%s Search StackOverflow for _______
fs: https://docs.flutter.dev/search?q=%s Search Flutter.dev for ________
fp: https://pub.dev/packages?q=%s Search Flutter Packages for _______
# Use google to search the current site you're on
site: javascript:location='https://www.google.com/search?num=100&q=site:'+escape(location.hostname)+'+%s' Search Current Site for _______
home: http://maps.google.com/maps?f=q&source=s_q&hl=en&q=from+171%20Lincoln%20Avenue%20Rockville%20Centre%20NY%2011570+to+%s Direction from home ---> _______
work: http://maps.google.com/maps?f=q&source=s_q&hl=en&q=from+509%20Dekalb%20Avenue%20Brooklyn%20NY%2011205+to+%s Direction from work ---> _______
